If you're interested in a more contemporary take on the genre, consider "White Night". This gripping mystery stars a talented ensemble of actors and will keep you guessing until the very end!

If you're looking for something more adventurous, "The Adventures of Tom Sawyer" could also be an enjoyable watch, with classic storytelling and a talented cast. Enjoy the movies!

On the other hand, if you're interested in a fantasy story set in a parallel universe, 'The Golden Compass' might be more appealing to you. With an impressive cast including Nicole Kidman and Daniel Craig, it follows young Lyra Belacqua on her quest to save kidnapped children from a mysterious organization."
